title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Video-Based Collaborative Learning for Practical Mathematics Skill Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze job-related math problems via video case studies and derive solutions with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can create and share videos explaining math problem-solving processes through collaborative learning with peers
Learners can improve their problem-solving strategies two or more times using video-based feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
